DOC.brief_summary: This study seek address whether different type daily disposable soft contact lens may beneficial option patient complain eye strain visual discomfort use digital device .
DOC.criteria: Primary Spectacle prescription 0.75 6.00 D sphere 0.75 diopter refractive cylinder Current singlevision soft contact lens wearer Monocular acuity 20/25 good eye ( Snellen ) Selfreported complaint eyestrain digital device No ocular pathology and/or history eye surgery No history strabismus strabismus surgery No gas permeable lens wear least 3 month Subjects may optometrist , optician optometry student Primary Corneal staining , blepharitis and/or MGD bad Grade 2 NRA less +1.50 D Exophoria near > 6 prism diopter Vertical phoria > 1 prism diopter Presence tropia
